LTD - GL-200k George Lynch Kamikaze This GL-200k George Lynch Kamikaze is in good shape, few signs of wear besides some pick scratches. Specs: Body: basswood body Neck: bolt-on maple neck Scale: 25.5″ Fingerboard: rosewood fingerboard and 22 extra-jumbo frets. The strings are secured by a set of LTD tuners, along with a Floyd Rose Special locking tremolo bridge. Electronics: pair of ESP Designed pickups—an LS-120N single coil in the neck position and an LH-150B humbucker in the bridge position. Features a single master volume with a push/pull pickup selector to switch between the single coil and humbucker.
